languages.text: "Никак нет, Лорд-капитан. Я в здравом уме и памяти, служу династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Абеляр пытается придать своему голосу обычную строгость и крепость, но выходит это у него немного наигранно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Никак нет, Лорд-капитан. Я в здравом уме и памяти, служу династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Абеляр пытается придать своему голосу обычную строгость и крепость, но выходит это у него немного наигранно.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Никак нет, Лорд-капитан. Я в здравом уме и памяти, служу династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Абеляр пытается придать своему голосу обычную строгость и крепость, но выходит это у него немного наигранно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “再也没见过了，舰长大人。我的头脑与记忆都很健全，我活着就是为了侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”{n}阿贝拉德的话中带着他一贯的严厉与决心，但却包含着一丝造作的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “再也没见过了，舰长大人。我的头脑与记忆都很健全，我活着就是为了侍奉冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”{n}阿贝拉德的话中带着他一贯的严厉与决心，但却包含着一丝造作的意味。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

languages.text: «Nunca, Lord Capitán. Estoy en mi sano juicio ¡y vivo para servir a la casa von Valancius!». {n}Abelard intenta dotar su habitual severidad y vigor a sus palabras, pero el resultado es un tanto forzado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nunca, Lord Capitán. Estoy en mi sano juicio ¡y vivo para servir a la casa von Valancius!». {n}Abelard intenta dotar su habitual severidad y vigor a sus palabras, pero el resultado es un tanto forzado.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「一度たりともありません、ロード・キャプテン。私は心も記憶も健常で、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕えるために生きているのです！」{n}アベラルドははその言葉にいつもの厳しさと威厳を加えようと努めたが、いささかわざとらしいものになってしまっていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「一度たりともありません、ロード・キャプテン。私は心も記憶も健常で、フォン・ヴァランシウス家に仕えるために生きているのです！」{n}アベラルドははその言葉にいつもの厳しさと威厳を加えようと努めたが、いささかわざとらしいものになってしまっていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht ein einziges Mal, Lord Captain. Ich bin bei gesundem Verstand, meine Erinnerungen sind klar, und ich lebe, um Haus Valancius zu dienen!" {n}Abelard müht sich, seinen Worten die übliche Strenge und den üblichen Nachdruck einzuhauchen, doch sie klingen etwas bemüht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nicht ein einziges Mal, Lord Captain. Ich bin bei gesundem Verstand, meine Erinnerungen sind klar, und ich lebe, um Haus Valancius zu dienen!" {n}Abelard müht sich, seinen Worten die übliche Strenge und den üblichen Nachdruck einzuhauchen, doch sie klingen etwas bemüht.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Pas une seule fois, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis sain d'esprit, j'ai toute ma mémoire et je vis pour servir la maison von Valancius ! » {n}Abélard s'efforce de prononcer ces mots avec sa gravité et sa vigueur habituelles, mais son ton ne paraît pas tout à fait naturel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pas une seule fois, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je suis sain d'esprit, j'ai toute ma mémoire et je vis pour servir la maison von Valancius ! » {n}Abélard s'efforce de prononcer ces mots avec sa gravité et sa vigueur habituelles, mais son ton ne paraît pas tout à fait naturel.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Asla Lord Kaptan. Aklım ve hafızam yerindedir, vazifemse von Valancius Hanesi'ne hizmet etmektir! {n}Abelard, sözlerini daimi ciddiyeti ve coşkusuyla telaffuz etmeye çalışsa da biraz yapmacık bir tona kayıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not once, Lord Captain. I am of sound mind and memory, and I live to serve House von Valancius!" {n}Abelard strives to impart his usual severity and vigour to his words, but they come out slightly contrived.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Asla Lord Kaptan. Aklım ve hafızam yerindedir, vazifemse von Valancius Hanesi'ne hizmet etmektir! {n}Abelard, sözlerini daimi ciddiyeti ve coşkusuyla telaffuz etmeye çalışsa da biraz yapmacık bir tona kayıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
